mapper.sql: id, appNo, user, project_id, name, ip, cpu, memory, datadisk, status, hostmachine_id, platform, os, os_status, soft, soft_status, duedate, username, password, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select: select a.id, a.appNo, a.user, a.project_id, a.name, a.envCode, a.ip, a.cpu, a.memory, a.datadisk, a.status, a.hostmachine_id, a.platform, a.os, a.os_status, a.soft, a.soft_status, a.duedate, a.username, a.password, DATE_FORMAT(a.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') gmt_create, a.gmt_modified , b.name projectCodeName , c.name envCodeName from a left join t_project b on b.id=a.project_id left join t_environment c on c.id=a.envCode where a.appNo is not null
